title: Ex-finance chief ordered to return $4.7 million she stole from children's charity to buy fleet of planes, houses and a Corvette - MarketWatch
content: Ex-finance chief ordered to return $4.7 million she stole from children's charity to buy fleet of planes, houses and a Corvette  MarketWatch
description: Ruth Marie Phillips was sentenced to seven years for steering money from a West Virginia charity into her pockets and aviation business.
